```{r, echo=FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(DT)

# table with features
db <- readxl::read_xlsx("data/database.xlsx")

db$feature_id_0 <- sprintf(paste0("%0", nchar(max(db$feature_id))+1, "d_"), 
                         db$feature_id)

db %>% 
  mutate(feature_title = str_c("<a href='",
                         str_c(feature_id_0, filename),
                         ".html'>",
                         feature_title,
                         "</a>")) %>% 
  select(feature_title, collected, area) %>% 
  rename(feature = feature_title) %>% 
  mutate(area = factor(area)) %>% 
  distinct() %>% 
  DT::datatable(filter = 'top', 
                escape = FALSE,
                rownames = FALSE,
                options = list(pageLength = 150, 
                               autoWidth = TRUE,
                               dom = 'fltpi'))
```
